review_text: These baskets are lifesavers. Buying K Cups is so expensive this saves you a ton of money. I love being able to use any kind of coffee I like even an espresso ground and being able to use some over and over and over again they are worth every single penny.

evidence: works great.
review_text: This product is great -- it appears to be built to very tight tolerances (the lid has a mini o-ring for a very tight seal), which works great. Just a suggestion -- as consumers are getting more and more concerned about leached chemicals from plastics, and seem to believe that silicone is a better alternative, it is probably time to investigate how to replace the plastics in this product with silicone.

evidence: They work fine.
review_text: I was concerned that they'd leak or break.  But so far, they work fine.  The coffee is just as good or better, and a lot cheaper in the long run.

evidence: They are better than prefilled k cups. The down side- the lids do not have hinges. You have to hold the cup while you fill it so it will not tip over and spill your coffee grounds while you fill it.
review_title: They are better than prefilled k cups
review_text: They are better than prefilled k cups. The down side- the lids do not have hinges. When you are trying to fill them the lids overbalance the cup to one side. You have to hold the cup while you fill it so it will not tip over and spill your coffee grounds while you fill it.

evidence: Finally, I can use a Keurig machine without buying loads of little wasteful cups
review_text: Finally, I can use a Keurig machine without buying loads of little wasteful cups or messing around with cleaning.
